review: The set up for the Fire Stick was fast & Easy, we have been happy with it so far, no issues of any kind.  The only thing that is disappointing is the search engine.  It only shows you selections available from Amazon, you have to each each app separately for what you are looking for.  If the search showed the availability from all the apps at once, I would have given it a 5 rating!!
